entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 01:00 AM PST Sunday 29 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 47 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
